scripts.deploy:server: aws ecr get-login-password --region us-west-2 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 664190027399.dkr.ecr.us-west-2.amazonaws.com && docker tag circuitscan_server:latest 664190027399.dkr.ecr.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/circuitscan_server:latest && docker push 664190027399.dkr.ecr.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/circuitscan_server:latest
scripts.deploy:frontend: rm -rf dist/ && vite build && aws s3 rm s3://circuitscan.org/ --recursive && aws s3 sync dist/ s3://circuitscan.org/
